title: 06/03/21 DPS Hour 2 Chris Mannix
itunes:title: 06/03/21 DPS Hour 2 Chris Mannix
description:
Chris Mannix tells Dan that he kind of understands the Celtic's situation a little better after the news conference yesterday. Chris says he was uncertain if head coach Brad Stevens would have returned had he not been elevated.
